#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>

int main(){
	int T,N,M,S,P,Q;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	int j,k,k1,k2,Ans;
	while(T--){
		Ans=0;
		scanf("%d %d %d %d %d",&N,&M,&S,&P,&Q);
		k1=M/P-1;
		k2=M/Q-1;
		k=k1>k2?k1:k2;
		if(k<=0){k=1;}
		while(k<=S){
			//printf("--%d\n",k);
			k1=(k*P-M+1)%(N-M+1);
			k2=(k*Q-M+1)%(N-M+1);
			//printf("-%d %d\n",k1,k2);
			if(k1==k2){
				++Ans;
				++k;
				break;
			}
			++k;
		}
		if(Ans){
			j=1;
			//printf("\n");
			while(k<=S){
				//printf("---%d %d\n",k,j);
				k1=(j*P)%(N-M+1);
				k2=(j*Q)%(N-M+1);
				//printf("===%d %d\n",k1,k2);
				if(k1==k2){
					++Ans;
					break;
				}
				++j;
				++k;
			}
			if(Ans==2){
				Ans+=(S-k)/j;
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n",Ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
